mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username = #{username} and del_flag = '0'

select * from sys_user where del_flag = '0' and username != 'admin' and id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id=#{roleId})
and org_code like CONCAT(#{orgCode},'%')
and username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
and realname like CONCAT('%',#{realname},'%')
select * from sys_user where phone = #{phone} and del_flag = '0'
